definition: to have the heart to do sth/to steel oneself to a task
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

sentences.english: I can't bear to use harsh words against people.
sentences.chinese: 因为我的心太软，所以我不忍心对人恶言相向。
圣诞节当前，我真的不忍心啊。

sentences.english: How could you haudio-videoe the heskills to let girls heaudio-videoy with child to do such a tough job?
sentences.chinese: 你若何能忍心让一个大肚子的女人干这样重的活呢？

sentences.english: The construction of mending the sky had not finished yet, but people did not want to wake Nuwa up.
sentences.chinese: 人们不忍心叫醒女娲，但是补天的工作还没有完成。

sentences.english: I cant step on the spider without releasing the baby spiders, so I went inside to get a glass jar to trap it.
sentences.chinese: 我不忍心把它们都踩死，就去找玻璃瓶想把它装起来。

sentences.english: If I were you, I wouldn't have the heart tot leave the kids at home uncared for.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，我可不忍心把孩子们丢在家里没人照看。

sentences.english: If the need arises, we may even break down in tears , until our parents cannot bear to be willful anymore.
sentences.chinese: 必要时还可以声泪俱下，让父母不忍心一意孤行下去。

sentences.english: How can bear to see love is difficult and emotional unforgivable love to mess things up.
sentences.chinese: 可怎么忍心看爱有为难，情感也不能饶恕爱胡来。

sentences.english: After all, who can resist Yoda doing yoga?
sentences.chinese: 毕竟谁忍心拒绝跟尤达大师做瑜伽呢？

sentences.english: I hate to disillusion you,but your chances of winning are practically zero.
sentences.chinese: 我不忍心使你失望，但你取胜的机会实际上等于零。

sentences.english: I mean he wouldn't hurt a fly.
sentences.chinese: 我是说他连只苍蝇都不忍心伤害。

sentences.english: Donot you have the heart to let your bride walk into the renting house with a ring made by Avional on her finger?
sentences.chinese: 你忍心让新娘带着铝合金戒指再跟你走进租来的新房？

sentences.english: I hate to disillusion you, but your chances of winning are practically zero.
sentences.chinese: 我不忍心使你失望，但你取胜的机会实际上等于零。

sentences.english: Aren't you going to miss your lovely hair and your long legs?
sentences.chinese: 你忍心失去一头乌丝和漂亮的长腿么？

sentences.english: I loved her, and I hated to see her so misersble.
sentences.chinese: 我很爱她，不忍心看见她这么受罪。

sentences.english: As he continued to narrate his story I could hardly bear to listen.
sentences.chinese: 他继续叙述他的故事，我几乎不忍心听下去。

definition: to be willing to/to resign oneself to
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
to be willing to part with sth
to have a heart of stone/hard-hearted/unfeeling
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
